author: mturk
msg: Add pcre to the uriMap. This is conditional using HAS_PCRE flag.
The mapping is done using '$' as a delimiter. This means that all
uris having dollar in the name will be parsed as a regular expressions
[uri:$/examples/(?!\w*\.(gif|jpg)$)] will be parsed as regex without first $.
